DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic profile of a new human insulin (Jusline) after subcutaneous administration, and to compare this profile with Humulin insulin.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Jusline
DOC.detailed_description: To study the pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic profile of a new human insulin (Jusline) after subcutaneous administration in the abdominal, and to compare this profile with Humulin insulin for three different preparations (Regular, NPH, and Premixed Regular/NPH (30/70)).
DOC.criteria: Healthy Nondiabetic Age 1835 year Normal body mass index (BMI 1825 kg/m2) Diabetics Overweight/obese Anemic, with liver, cardiac, renal or thyroid dysfunction
